data.name: HUMAN LIVE-HOW LONG CAN HUMAN BEINGS EXIST?Survive the end of the earth, challenge disaster save the world
data.detailed_description:
• important note: this is just a very cheap game. Please confirm that you really like such a small game and then buy it
  • we are actually several students who love game development. We made this game without experience and funds. We are more trying to tell the story in our heart through learning. So please don't expect too much from this game. Please buy carefully, lest you buy a game you don't like. Thank you very much for your support and understanding.

    This is a game from the future!
    How long can human beings live on Earth?
    Predict how long humans can exist on Earth!
    Challenge more than 50 kinds of disasters that are destroying humanity!
    With global warming, disasters in various regions have become more frequent. Have you ever thought that one day nature will bring the final punishment to the world, and human civilization is about to come to an end, then how should you face it.
    One day in the future, a strong electromagnetic storm from the universe swept the world and human civilization regressed. The earth's magnetic poles have also deflected, causing unprecedented frequency and intensity of various natural disasters! Because of your outstanding leadership ability, you have been entrusted with the task of leading all human beings to fight against disasters and to work hard to survive longer before the end.

    [playing features]
    [real world map]
    Manage more than 20 regions, your choice determines whether humans can usher in the next sunrise.
    [4 technology lines]
    Use funds carefully and choose a reasonable upgrade route.
    [50 kinds of disasters]
    If you don't pay attention, humans will usher in the disaster.
    [10 dimensions]
    Examine your leadership skills in multiple dimensions of population, food, and social stability, and analyze the data. Any loss of control means that humans no longer have a future.
    [painful choice]
    You must always make trade-offs, and many people have to make sacrifices for the future of mankind.

    How long human beings can exist is a strategy game. You play a human commander. When the end is coming, you command human beings and struggle to survive.
    The initial population of the game will continue to grow. As it grows, there will be various kinds of disasters that interrupt the growth of the population. You need to solve the disaster by clicking.
    There are more than 50 kinds of disasters in the game that interrupt the normal development of the earth. You need to manage the disaster by clicking on the upgrade technology tree. Efforts are made to reduce the impact of disasters and maintain a stable development of population, food and social security in a difficult balance.
    Click on the upgrade technology tree to reduce the damage of the disaster, make the population grow, and the society is stable.
    At the same time, through your strategy, keep the population growing steadily to obtain capital growth and lead humanity to rebuild civilization.

    This time we want to make a "big" game, and command the thousands of troops, the map will go up to the outer ocean to the bottom of the ocean, the military internal ethics plot can not be less. According to this setting, it will not come out until the next dog year game.
    After some painful cuts and cuts, we cut off the hard-to-achieve functions and only kept the most important gameplay - choice. In the world view of the game, human civilization has reached the brink of destruction, and various disasters may swallow survivors at any time. As a leader, you must learn to balance the indicators and use the limited resources in the most critical places. Sometimes I have to torture my heart and give up part of the area and population.
    This is still a very big game. You manage the earth before the end of the day, and billions of people are waiting for your shelter. In addition to natural disasters, various man-made disasters occur from time to time and disrupt your plans.
    Finally, I sincerely hope that the scenes in the game will not appear in reality, and I hope that everyone can have fun when the game is officially launched!

data.short_description: How long can human beings live on Earth? Will the human being be destroyed when disaster strikes? A game from the future. Challenge more than 50 kinds of disasters that will destroy humanity in the future. Victims or survivors, destroy the world or save humanity?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WinXP
  • Processor: 2.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1.5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt9800
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: without online
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt9800
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: without online
